languages.text: Леди-Навигатор одарила Лорд-капитана усталой улыбкой — сорвавшийся ритуал был ловушкой для Леди Кассии, заготовленный предыдущим новатором Дома. Но благодаря Вольному Торговцу все, наконец, осталось позади. Пора было выбираться из сего проклятого места.

traits.locale_text: В благодарность за помощь Леди-Навигатор одаривает Лорд-капитана усталой улыбкой — сорвавшийся ритуал был ловушкой для Леди Кассии, заготовленный годы назад предыдущим новатором Дома. Но благодаря Вольному Торговцу все, наконец, позади. Пора выбираться из сего проклятого места.

languages.text: The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The abortive ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader had ensured that her plan fell to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.
languages.original_text: Леди-Навигатор одарила Лорд-капитана усталой улыбкой — сорвавшийся ритуал был ловушкой для Леди Кассии, заготовленный предыдущим новатором Дома. Но благодаря Вольному Торговцу все, наконец, осталось позади. Пора было выбираться из сего проклятого места.

traits.locale_text: The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House, but the Rogue Trader saw her plan fall to ruin. And now it was time to leave that accursed place.

The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House, but the Rogue Trader saw her plan fall to ruin. And now it was time to leave that accursed place.

The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The botched ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader saw her plan fall to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The botched ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader saw her plan fall to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The abortive ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader had ensured that her plan fell to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The abortive ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader had ensured that her plan fell to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

languages.text: 航宙士はロード・キャプテンに疲れた笑みを向けた。台無しになった儀式は、オーセリオ家の先代ノベイターがレディ・カシアを狙って仕掛けた罠だと判明した。しかし自由開拓者によってティシフォン・オーセリオの計画は潰えた。そして今、この呪われた場所を去る時が来た。
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The abortive ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader had ensured that her plan fell to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士はロード・キャプテンに疲れた笑みを向けた。台無しになった儀式は、オーセリオ家の先代ノベイターがレディ・カシアを狙って仕掛けた罠だと判明した。しかし自由開拓者によってティシフォン・オーセリオの計画は潰えた。そして今、この呪われた場所を去る時が来た。

languages.text: 卡西娅对舰长大人露出了疲惫的微笑。原来，这场失败的仪式，实际上是卡西娅家族的前任大族长为她设下的陷阱，但行商浪人亲手粉碎了她的计划。如今，是时候逃离这个被诅咒的地方了。
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The abortive ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader had ensured that her plan fell to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅对舰长大人露出了疲惫的微笑。原来，这场失败的仪式，实际上是卡西娅家族的前任大族长为她设下的陷阱，但行商浪人亲手粉碎了她的计划。如今，是时候逃离这个被诅咒的地方了。

languages.text: La navigatrice adresse un sourire épuisé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. Qui aurait pu deviner que le rituel n'était finalement qu'un piège tendu par la précédente Novator à l'intention de dame Cassia ? Heureusement, grâce à l'intervention {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, ses plans sont tombés à l'eau, et le moment est venu de quitter cet endroit maudit.
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The abortive ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader had ensured that her plan fell to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

traits.locale_text: La navigatrice adresse un sourire épuisé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. Qui aurait pu deviner que le rituel n'était finalement qu'un piège tendu par la précédente Novator à l'intention de dame Cassia ? Heureusement, grâce à l'intervention {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, ses plans sont tombés à l'eau, et le moment est venu de quitter cet endroit maudit.

languages.text: La lady Navegante saludó {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán con una sonrisa cansada. El ritual abortado había resultado ser una trampa para lady Cassia, tendida por la anterior Novator de su casa. Pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se encargó de frustrar sus planes. Había llegado el momento de abandonar ese lugar maldito.
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The abortive ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader had ensured that her plan fell to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

traits.locale_text: La lady Navegante saludó {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán con una sonrisa cansada. El ritual malogrado había resultado ser una trampa para lady Cassia, tendida por la anterior Novator de su casa. Pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se encargó de frustrar sus planes. Había llegado el momento de abandonar ese lugar maldito.

languages.text: Die Lady Navigator bedachte den Lord Captain mit einen müden Lächeln. Das unterbrochene Ritual entpuppte sich als Falle, die Lady Cassia von der früheren Novatorin des Hauses gestellt worden war. Doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hatte diesen Plan scheitern lassen. Und nun war es an der Zeit, diesen verfluchten Ort zu verlassen.
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The abortive ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader had ensured that her plan fell to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

traits.locale_text: Die Lady Navigator bedachte den Lord Captain mit einen müden Lächeln. Das verbockte Ritual entpuppte sich als Falle, die Lady Cassia von der früheren Novatorin des Hauses gestellt worden war. Doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ließ diesen Plan scheitern. Und nun war es an der Zeit, diesen verfluchten Ort zu verlassen.

languages.text: Leydi Rotacı, Lord Kaptan'a yorgun argın gülümsedi. Yarıda kalan ayinin, Hane'nin önceki Rota Reisi'nin Leydi Cassia'ya kurduğu bir tuzak olduğu ortaya çıkmıştı. Hür Tacir sayesinde bu plan başarısız olmuştu. Artık bu uğursuz yerden çıkma vakti gelmişti.
languages.original_text: The Lady Navigator graced the Lord Captain with a tired smile. The abortive ritual had turned out to be a trap set for Lady Cassia by the previous Novator of her House. But the Rogue Trader had ensured that her plan fell to ruin. And now it was time to desert that accursed place.

traits.locale_text: Leydi Rotacı, Lord Kaptan'a yorgun argın gülümsedi. Yarıda kalan ayinin, Hanenin önceki Rota Reisi'nin Leydi Cassia'ya kurduğu bir tuzak olduğu ortaya çıkmıştı. Hür Tacir sayesinde bu plan başarısız olmuştu. Artık bu uğursuz yerden çıkma vakti gelmişti.
